page.title: 06Farm crops - Rape & Oats
page.content: {RAPE: Rape has another name{Brassica Napus.} The rape is a close relation to the swede. It is especially grown in India , Eastern Asia , and Denmark. The seeds contain 35 _ 40% fatty oil, which is extracted by pressure. Rape seeds have been known in the past to be used for lighting. Now its being used for edible oil, margarine etc. Harvesting should be done early in the morning to gain maxium crop yield { {OATS:} Both barley and oats provide food for animals. A lot of oats are grown in Scotland. Scotsmen are fond of porridge which is made from oats.
